name: Rescue the cat witch
description:
A game about a witch, a cat, and some zombies. It is a platform game. You play as the witch, and the goal is to get to your cat, who is in the bottom right corner. Stay away from the zombies, they hurt you, and if you are exposed to their presence for a long period of time, you die. Reload page to restart if you died. You can shoot magic missiles at the zombies to get rid of them, you might need multiple.

Can be played here: https://bjoernaf.github.io/catwitch

And code can be found here: https://github.com/bjoernaf/catwitch

Instructions for how to play:

* Tap left and right side of window to move horizontally.

* Tap bottom of screen to jump.

* Tap middle of screen to shoot magic missiles
